content: middle of each side once you are finished sewing on all of your spikes sew on the sphere ring to the top of the sphere refer to the diagram make sure you put the sphere ring through the chain before you sew you will not be able to attach the chain after you sew the sphere ring to the sphere next place your handle cap onto either side of your handle and sew into place using your sewing pins position your handle cap ring on top of the cap again make sure you put the cap ring through the chain before you sew and voila your morning star is complete i hope you enjoyed this pattern if you have any questions feel free to reach out to me on my instagram @leapdoublecrochet or on my ravelry @ggrommes
